thread.title: Coronation Street

author: Fiona Flynn
title: Coronation Street
text: Things are looking up at the factory as the Carters have secured a huge new order, however Carla is soon raging as she realises that Johnny and Aidan have risked their reputation by buying cheap material. Meanwhile, when Kylie finds out from Sarah how David threatened her by claiming that they'd shop her to the police for murder, Kylie is appalled and assures Sarah she would never do that. She then persuades Sarah to have a holiday in Italy to clear her head, although David is furious with Kylie for meddling with his plans and they row. Nothing unusual there then. Also tonight, that creep Jamie continues to blackmail Luke and elsewhere, Ken and Audrey end up going for lunch together....could there be...? Nahhh. Wait, could there??
